page.title: 08SHERIFF HUTTON ADMIN.
page.content: The Parish of Sheriff Hutton with Cornbourgh is in the Ryedale district of North Yorkshire.The County Council is in charge of education,main road lighting and cleaning,and providing a weekly mobile libary service.Ryedale District is responsible for rubbish collection,planning matters and bus tokens for pensioners.The Parish Council is a pressure group for village needs.It responsible for lighting off main roads,maintaining public rights of way,siting buses shelters,provision and maintenance of seats and litter bins,maintaining and admin. the village greens and verge cutting within the village(paid for by N.Y.C.C.).It can make small grants towards local activities.There is mains water,elec.,no gas.There is a sewer system with a treatment plant outside the village.
